pages.text: 既然您的$(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/soul_gem)地獄魂石$()中有大量的$(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/demon_will)惡魔意志$()，現在是時候探索當您將其釋放到世界上時會發生什麼。 $(br)首先，你需要創造一個$(item)惡魔坩堝$()，然後用$(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/demon_will)惡魔意志$()填充它。

pages.heading: Demon Crystallizer
pages.text: 這將慢慢消耗大氣中的$(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/demon_will)惡魔意志$()以產生$(item)意志水晶$()。第一個尖塔消耗大約100點$(raw)意志$()形成，隨後的所有尖塔每個消耗40點，但可以在$(item)惡魔坩堝$()中燃燒50點。最大的$(item)水晶簇$()最多可以有7個尖塔。

If you have more than 1,024 total $(raw)Will$() in your inventory (Across any number of $(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/will_manipulation/soul_gem)Tartaric Gems$() and of any one type), you can harvest these crystals by right-clicking the spire with an empty hand. This will remove all but the central spire. $(br2)However, if you do not have enough $(raw)will$(), $(italic)really$() need that central spire's Crystal, or are just in a hurry, you can harvest the whole lot with a pickaxe.
